context.description: Use the Servers View to configure and manage your servers.
Choose the server type that you want to add and configure
Type the name, host and port information, and the start, restart, and stop commands for your Apache server.
Type the name, host, port and command information for your web server.
Type the name, port, and document root information for your Jetty server.
Type the name, host, and port information for your Jaxer server.
Type the name, path, and port information for your Jaxer+Apache server installation.
Type the name, path, and command information for your MySQL server.
Type the name and command information for your XAMPP server.
